overview: Scottish Ballet's first ever Digital Artist in Residence, Zachary Eastwood-Bloom, builds on his visually innovative collection of works, collaborating with three choreographers and composers to create Technology//Mythology//Allegory - a series of three new works under The Fates.  Motion tracked and digitally augmented, The Fates is a collaboration between Zachary Eastwood-Bloom, choreographer Nicholas Shoesmith and composer Ben Chatwin. The Fates explores notions of autonomy and control in a digital society.
title: The Fates - Scottish Ballet
